text: ATN B4U Movies is a Canadian Category B specialty channel. It is owned by Asian Television Network International. It broadcasts programming from B4U Movies and Canadian contents. ==History== ATN B4U Movies was launched as a pay service in March 2001B4U launches channel in Canada with ATN using the following license. However, on September 25, 2012, this license was revoked at ATN's request. The channel re-launched on June 17, 2012 as ATN Hindi Movie Channel 3. ==References== ==Other websites== * * B4U Movies Category:2004 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian television channels
title: ATN B4U Movies
